Reviews.Title: The camera is GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: ljcoddington
Reviews.Content: I think the camera is wonderful I like the color. The case was very cheap and not enough room to hold everything.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kim Wilson
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera right before our last trip to Cuba.  Took great pictures and was easy to use.  I still need to learn more about all the features and have yet to use the tripod.  I will learn about it and enjoy it for years.  Love the rechargable battery.  It last a long time.  Also was quick to get here.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!
Reviews.Author: Rhonda K. Stech
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. Takes beautifully clear pictures. Fast shutter speed. Came with case, extra battery, AD card and a table top tripod. Very reasonably priced for a great little camera

ProductInfo.Features:
16.0 Megapixel sensor
Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor
16x Optical Zoom
28mm Wide-Angle lens with Optical Image Stabilizer
720p HD video in stereo sound
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom and 720p HD Video (Red) Super Bundle With DigPro 32GB High Speed Card , Digpro Deluxe Case, Deluxe Cleaning Kit ,Spare Battery, Tripod
